Name: Bright Bob
About the game: Bright Bob - a Fascinating and colorful game of skill and reaction, Bob only has time to blink :) Our hero, bright-eyed Bob, randomly came on the scene, and there is lawlessness: Drop boxes, safes, nails and hammers! Try not to fall under the impact of these items! game Features: - Catch the bonus Life and the stars - The game has a variety of play: career and score game. - Compete against friends because the game has built-in high score table - Train reaction
